data.description: read / write PHP session data from MySQL
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I chose the namespace to keep the ties this module has to
    PHP::Session as close as possible. It shares the
    PHP::Session::Serializer::PHP module to do session
    encoding/decoding. Given the number of sites storing PHP session
    data in MySql to provide cross server sessions I felt the need to
    provide this module to the community.
